summary: Atanasio attempts to liberate the powers of the mythical North Wind in Terranova while Watuna, Ane and Peiot, descendants of those who trapped the North Wind in a pot, try to defeat him before he achieves his purpose.
cast: Damián Velasco|Chelo Vivares|Gonzalo Durán|Isabel Fernández|María José Castro|María Romero|Amparo Climent|Teófilo Martínez|Pedro Sempson|José Carabias|Daniel Dicenta|Eduardo Jover|José María Martín|Sonja Ball|Thor Bishopric|Daniel Brochu|Tedd Dillon|Richard M Dumont|Kathleen Fee|A.J. Henderson|Rick Jones|Terrence Scammell|Vicente Gisbert
director: Directors: Maite Ruiz de Austri, Carlos Varela | 1 more credit »
title: La leyenda del viento del Norte
